options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking (Cooldown: 4 sec. Inflicts 500% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)

options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage.
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec.
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Fire attack, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150 Fire Damage: Fire Explosion (Inflicts 180% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 150 to below 250 Fire Damage: Infernal Road (Inflicts 230% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 250+ Fire Damage: Meteor (Inflicts 370% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Meteor Burns enemies on hit for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Meteor increases Fire Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain: Attack Speed +1% and Casting Speed +1.5% for every 5 Fire Resistance

options.explain:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Water attack, depending on your Water Damage.
- 100 to below 150 Water Damage: Ice Needle
- 150 to below 250 Water Damage: Ice Breath
- 250+ Water Damage: Blizzard
- Blizzard Freezes enemies on hit for 10 sec.
- Blizzard increases Water Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 50% chance of delivering a Water attack, depending on your Water Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)
- 100 to below 150 Water Damage: Ice Needle (Inflicts 180% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 150 to below 250 Water Damage: Ice Breath (Inflicts 230% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 250+ Water Damage: Blizzard (Inflicts 370% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Blizzard Freezes enemies on hit for 10 sec. (Cooldown: 30 sec.)
- Blizzard increases Water Resistance +20 and Skill Atk. +2% for 30 sec. (Max Stacks: 1)

options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Evasion +2% and Physical/Magical Critical +2.5% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Evasion +2% and Physical/Magical Critical +2.5% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px (Cooldown: 3 sec. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.

options.explain:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment.
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%
options.explainDetail:
Applies the following, depending on the total of Attack Speed options (+/-) on your equipped armor, accessories, and Special Equipment. (Avatars, emblems, gems, Creatures, and titles included)
- 100 to below 120%: Skill Atk. +10%
- 120 to below 140%: Skill Atk. +20%
- 140% or more: Skill Atk. +30%

options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 30% chance of applying one of the following 3 effects. (Cooldown: 3 sec. Max Stacks: 1. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Casts Horizontal Cube on a randomly selected enemy in 200 px. Damage Value +7034.
- Casts Horizontal Cube on up to 3 randomly selected enemies in 300 px. Damage Value +7815.
- Casts Horizontal Cube on up to 5 randomly selected enemies in 500 px. Damage Value +8597.

Attacks apply the following at the cost of 3 Red Cube Fragments.
- Burns enemies within 300 px for 15 sec.
- Burns you for 15 sec.

options.explainDetail:
Attacks apply the following at the cost of 3 Red Cube Fragments. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Burns enemies within 300 px for 15 sec.
- Burns you for 15 sec. (This Burn effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Burn Tolerance.)
Skill Atk. +14% while you're Burned
